(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP (NNP Part) (CD 1)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, In-1)
pobj(In-1, Part-2)
num(Part-2, 1-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VBD discussed)
      (NP
        (NP (DT some))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the)
              (ADJP (RBR more) (JJ familiar))
              (NNS cuts))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP
                (NP (NN Beef))
                (VP (VBN used)
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP (NNS steaks))))))))))
    (. .)))

root(ROOT-0, discussed-2)
dobj(discussed-2, some-3)
prep(some-3, of-4)
det(cuts-8, the-5)
advmod(familiar-7, more-6)
amod(cuts-8, familiar-7)
pobj(of-4, cuts-8)
prep(cuts-8, of-9)
pobj(of-9, Beef-10)
partmod(Beef-10, used-11)
prep(used-11, for-12)
pobj(for-12, steaks-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP They))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ prime) (NNS cuts))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (VP (VBP are)
              (VP (VBN located)
                (PP (IN on)
                  (NP
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (NN top))
                      (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                        (ADVP (RB back))
                        (-RRB- -RRB-)))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN cow)))))))))))
    (. .)))

cop(cuts-5, are-2)

dep(top-11, back-13)

pobj(of-15, cow-17)

          (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)

    (VP (VB Think)

      (PP (IN as)
        (NP
          (NP
            (NP (VBG chewing) (NN gum))

              (WHADVP (WRB when))
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))

                  (ADVP (RB just))
                  (VP (VBG starting)
                    (S
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB chew)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN lot))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (NN fascia))))
        (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
          (NP
            (NP (JJ white) (NNS sheets))
            (PP (IN between)
              (NP (DT the) (NN meat))))
          (-RRB- -RRB-))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ makes)
              (S
                (NP (PRP it))
                (ADJP
                  (ADJP (RB really) (JJ bouncy))
                  (CC and)
                  (ADJP (RB almost) (RB squeaky)))
                (SBAR
                  (WHADVP (WRB when))
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP you))
                    (VP (VBP chew)
                      (PP (IN on)
                        (NP (PRP it))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB So))
    (SBAR (IN although)
      (S
        (NP (DT the) (NNP Knuckle))
        (VP

            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (DT the) (NN leg))))

          (VP (VBZ gets)
            (NP
              (NP (NNS lots))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NN excercise))))
            (, ,)))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (VP (VBZ is) (RB n't)
      (ADJP (RB too) (JJ tough)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB eat)
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNP Yakiniku))
                  (CC and)
                  (NP
                    (NP (PRP$ its) (NN one))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (NNS parts))))))
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB order)
                    (SBAR (IN if)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP you))
                        (VP (VBP want)
                          (NP
                            (NP (NN meat))

                              (WHNP (WDT that))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP
      (VP
        (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
          (S
            (VP (VB Dependent)
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP
                  (NP (NN availability))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN beef) (NNS cuts)))))))
          (-RRB- -RRB-))
        (VB Please)
        (NP (NN call))
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (NN reserve))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB mention)
        (NP (DT the) (JJ ieatishootipost) (NN set))))
    (. .)))

prep(Dependent-2, on-3)

nn(cuts-8, beef-7)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This) (NN article))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (VP (VBN made)
        (ADJP (JJ possible))
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN help))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NNP Magosaburou) (NNP Restaurant)))))))
    (. .)))
